info.title: Calculated_Values_Service
info.description: Set of API endpoints for all mortgage and affordability calculations

n_dependants.title: N Dependants
n_dependants.description: Number of individuals financially dependant upon the applicants

AffordabilityModelLite.title: AffordabilityModelLite
AffordabilityModelLite.description: Affordability Lite inputs for lite calculations.

result_id.title: Result Id
result_id.description: The unique identifier for the result

debt_to_income.title: Debt To Income
debt_to_income.description: The amount of debt (excluding the mortgage) as a ratio of the income (unitless)

max_loan.title: Max Loan
max_loan.description: The maximum loan that the applicant can afford to take (£)

max_loan_by_market_value.description: The maximum loans based varied by the market value used in the calculations.

max_loan_limitations.description: The various upper limits applied to the max loan. The final max loan equals the lowest cap.

loan_to_income.title: Loan To Income
loan_to_income.description: The ratio of max_loan to the gross income of the applicant (unitless)

requested_loan_affordable.title: Requested Loan Affordable
requested_loan_affordable.description: Whether the requested loan amount is affordable.

impact_per_pound_change.title: Impact Per Pound Change
impact_per_pound_change.description: The impact on the max loan per £1 of expenditure

AffordabilityOutput.title: AffordabilityOutput
AffordabilityOutput.description: Overall summary of the affordability calculation

max_loan.title: Max Loan
max_loan.description: The maximum loan that the applicant can afford to take (£)

loan_to_income.title: Loan To Income
loan_to_income.description: The ratio of max_loan to the gross income of the applicant (unitless)

requested_loan_affordable.title: Requested Loan Affordable
requested_loan_affordable.description: Whether the requested loan amount is affordable.

id.title: Id
id.description: The id of the passive income

acceptance.title: Acceptance
acceptance.description: The percentage of the income accepted

declared_gross_income.title: Declared Gross Income
declared_gross_income.description: Annual declared gross income (prior to income acceptance)

national_insurance.title: National Insurance
national_insurance.description: Annual National Insurance contributions across all jobs

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: Annual total tax paid (including both salary and dividends)

pension.title: Pension
pension.description: Annual pension contributions, assuming an auto-enrolment salary sacrifice scheme

net_income.title: Net Income
net_income.description: Annual Net Income (Gross income minus pension, tax, ni and student loans

disposable_net_income.title: Disposable Net Income
disposable_net_income.description: Annual disposable net income (net income minus committed expenses

bracket.title: Bracket
bracket.description: The tax bracket the applicant is in

ApplicantTaxPaidModel.description: Summary of tax paid by applicant

prev_dividends.title: Prev Dividends
prev_dividends.description: Annual dividends from the second most recent year

DirectorLite.description: The details about an additional property owned by the applicant which is let out.

last_salary.title: Last Salary
last_salary.description: Annual salary from most recent year

last_dividends.description: Annual dividends from most recent year

last_bonus.description: Annual bonus from most recent year

last_commission.description: Annual commission from most recent year

last_overtime.title: Last Overtime
last_overtime.description: Annual overtime from most recent year

household_utilities_goods_and_repairs.title: Household Utilities Goods And Repairs
household_utilities_goods_and_repairs.description: Monthly household utilities, goods, and repairs

recreation_social_and_holidays.title: Recreation Social And Holidays
recreation_social_and_holidays.description: Monthly payments on recreation, social activities, and holidays

communications_and_digital_services.title: Communications And Digital Services
communications_and_digital_services.description: Monthly communication and digital services (e.g. wifi)

council_tax.title: Council Tax
council_tax.description: Monthly council tax payments on security property

service_charge_ground_rent.title: Service Charge Ground Rent
service_charge_ground_rent.description: Monthly service charge or ground rent on security property

other_essential_expenditure.title: Other Essential Expenditure
other_essential_expenditure.description: Any other large expenditure items which the applicant would not be willing/able to give up in order to cover the mortgage payments (as a monthly amount).

EssentialExpenditureInputs.description: Monthly essential expenditure inputs for affordability calculations.

committed_expenditure.description: Total fixed monthly payments of all non-revolving loans

credit_card_balance.description: Total balance of all credit cards and other revolving credit

GetAffordabilityResponseDto.description: The response dto for the get affordability endpoint.

loan_to_income.title: Loan To Income
loan_to_income.description: The loan to income ratio of the case

max_loan.title: Max Loan
max_loan.description: The maximum loan that the applicant can afford to take (£)

HTTPStatus.title: HTTPStatus
HTTPStatus.description:
HTTP status codes and reason phrases

Status codes from the following RFCs are all observed:

    * RFC 7231: Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP/1.1), obsoletes 2616
    * RFC 6585: Additional HTTP Status Codes
    * RFC 3229: Delta encoding in HTTP
    * RFC 4918: HTTP Extensions for WebDAV, obsoletes 2518
    * RFC 5842: Binding Extensions to WebDAV
    * RFC 7238: Permanent Redirect
    * RFC 2295: Transparent Content Negotiation in HTTP
    * RFC 2774: An HTTP Extension Framework
    * RFC 7725: An HTTP Status Code to Report Legal Obstacles
    * RFC 7540: Hypertext Transfer Protocol Version 2 (HTTP/2)
    * RFC 2324: Hyper Text Coffee Pot Control Protocol (HTCPCP/1.0)
    * RFC 8297: An HTTP Status Code for Indicating Hints
    * RFC 8470: Using Early Data in HTTP

unfiltered_gross_income.title: Unfiltered Gross Income
unfiltered_gross_income.description: Total declared monthly gross income (including unaccepted income)

net_pay.title: Net Pay
net_pay.description: Total monthly net pay (gross pay minus tax, NI, pension and student loans)

total_committed_expenditures.title: Total Committed Expenditures
total_committed_expenditures.description: Sum of monthly payments for loans, credit cards and committed expenditures

net_disposable_income.title: Net Disposable Income
net_disposable_income.description: Total monthly net income after expenditures (personal ONLY) have been deducted

disposable_income.title: Disposable Income
disposable_income.description: Total remaining monthly income after all (both personal and household) expenditures have been deducted

available_income.title: Available Income
available_income.description: Monthly amount available to put towards mortgage payments.

total_essential_expenditure.title: Total Essential Expenditure
total_essential_expenditure.description: Total monthly essential expenditure (personal and household)

acceptance.title: Acceptance
acceptance.description: The percentage of the income which is accepted (0-1)

accepted_amount.title: Accepted Amount
accepted_amount.description: The amount of income accepted for income-expenditure calculations

IncomeStreamModel.title: IncomeStreamModel
IncomeStreamModel.description: Result model detailing a stream of income

passive_incomes.title: Passive Incomes
passive_incomes.description: Incomes not associated with any job (e.g. investments)

IncomesLite.title: IncomesLight
IncomesLite.description:
The expenditure profile of the applicant broken down into loans,
committed expenditures and properties.

present.title: Present
present.description: Whether this type of student loan is present

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The annual income threshold (per job), over which the applicant starts paying back their loan

income_above_threshold.title: Income Above Threshold
income_above_threshold.description: The annual income above the threshold, on which payments will be calculated

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The payment rate (%) for this student loan

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: The annual student loan payment (rate x income_above_threshold)

salary.title: Salary
salary.description: The total accepted annual gross salary

dividends.title: Dividends
dividends.description: The total accepted annual gross dividends

JobAcceptedBreakdownModel.title: JobAcceptedBreakdownModel
JobAcceptedBreakdownModel.description: Details of how much salary and dividends are accepted from the job

letter.title: Letter
letter.description: The national insurance letter used for calculations

JobNationalInsuranceModel.description: Output model detail the national insurance contributions in a job.

job_is_accepted.description: Whether the job is accepted as valid

exclusion_reason.title: Exclusion Reason
exclusion_reason.description: The reason, if any, for why a job is not included in the calculations

job_title.title: Job Title
job_title.description: The specific job role declared by the applicant

is_main_job.title: Is Main Job
is_main_job.description: Whether the calculations have treated the job as the main job

main_income_is_stable.title: Main Income Is Stable
main_income_is_stable.description: [Depreciated] Is the main income considered stable (only applies to self-employed jobs)

total.title: Total
total.description: The total annual min student loan payments

JobStudentLoanModel.description: Output model for the job student loan breakdown.
